data.caption: Clarification sought from Canara HSBC Life Insurance Company Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Canara HSBC Life Insurance Company Ltd on December 24 2025 with reference to news appeared in https://www.business-standard.com dated December 24 2025 quoting "Canara HSBC Life Insurance and Equitas Small Finance Bank Announce Strategic Bancassurance Partnership to Drive Insurance Inclusion"

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Canara HSBC Life Insurance Company Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 17 2025 the Equity Shares of Canara HSBC Life Insurance Company Ltd (Scrip Code: 544583) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251016 dated October 16 2025.
